title: eCommerce Insights Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard built using Google Looker Studio to analyze over 51,300 retail transactions, displaying key metrics and visualizations.

title: Retail Transaction Dashboard
description: Dashboard displaying retail transactions processed from over 5,800 records, visualizing transaction amounts and product categories.

title: Sentiment Analysis on IKN
description: Analyzed Twitter data from the 2024 vice presidential debate using Naive Bayes methods to visualize sentiment and topic trends.

title: Mathematical Modelling of Car Sales Competition
description: Created a competition model visualization of car sales in Indonesia using existing datasets for the Energy Field Modelling course.

title: Implementation of Newton Cotes Numerical Method
description: Estimated the area of West Java using a mathematical approach and numerical methods, achieving a relative error of 2.97%.
